breakout

Class BRectangles

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakout.BRectangles

  • public class BRectangles
extends java.lang.Object
    Breakout Rectangles class to create the rectangles. Uses final width and height values to set up the sizes of the rectangle, then paints the rectangle in.
    Version:
    Summer 2018
    Author:
    kennemat

    • Constructor Detail

      • BRectangles

        public BRectangles(int row,
                   int col,
                   java.awt.Color bColor)
        Constructor for the BRectangles class. Sets the rectangles x, y, and color based off what row / column the piece fits in.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the rectangle.
        col - The column of the rectangle.
        bColor - The color of the rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Overridden paint methods for the class. Sets the color of the object, then paints in the rectangle.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics field for this object.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Returns the bounds for the rectangle.
        Returns:
        A Rectangle object with the x, y, width, and height of this object.
